parameters.name: AddAccount
parameters.description: The IDs of Alibaba Cloud accounts to which you want to share the custom image. Valid values of N: 1 to 10. If you specify more than 10 Alibaba Cloud account IDs, the system processes only the first 10 account IDs. The excess account IDs are ignored.

parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description:
The ID of the shared custom image.

>  You can share images encrypted by using CMKs but cannot share images encrypted by using service keys. When you share an image encrypted by using a service key, an error is reported.

parameters.name: IsPublic
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to publish or unpublish a community image. Valid values:

*   true: publishes the custom image as a community image.
*   false: unpublishes a community image. The unpublish operation takes effect only on community images.

Default value: false.

parameters.name: LaunchPermission
parameters.description: > This parameter is in invitational preview and is not publicly available.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the custom image. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RemoveAccount
parameters.description: The IDs of Alibaba Cloud accounts from which you want to unshare the custom image. Valid values of N: 1 to 10. If you specify more than 10 Alibaba Cloud account IDs, the system processes only the first 10 account IDs. The excess account IDs are ignored.
